title: What is the purpose of the bundles?
body: Anyone know what is the point of the bundles riot puts out?

replies.body: Was there a particular bundle you were curious about, or just bundles in general?
Is there some story behind that name? Without one it seems...boring. Also you have no title. What do you do? Let us get to know you before you escape back into the wild.
i bet it has something to do with a birth date and a lamp
Nope i just see alot of bundles and wonder why they're existent

To pretend you are getting a great deal when in reality you'll only use 30% of the skins in the bundle. Seriously, don't buy a bundle unless you already bought all the champions with ip and actually want most of the skins in the bundle.

They come at a discount and often with limited skins as an incentive for players to buy them.
So you buy things. It's a discount on buying everything separately, but if you're only gonna use one or two things in the bundle, it's a waste.
